channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scoop: Saudi defense minister says Trump not bombing Iran would embolden regime

item.description: Journalist Don Lemon was released from prison on Friday after federal agents arrested him in Los Angeles Thursday evening following backlash over his ...

item.title: Senate passes shutdown fix, extends DHS talks
item.description: The Senate passed legislation Friday to s eparate the fight over ICE funding from the threat of a broader government shutdown. Why it matters: It's a ...

item.title: "We're in the singularity": New AI platform skips the humans entirely
item.description: The tech world is agog (and creeped out) about Moltbook , a Reddit-style social network for AI agents to communicate with each other. No humans needed...

item.title: Trump wants to build a 250-foot-tall arch, dwarfing the Lincoln Memorial
item.description: The president is eyeing a plot of land near Memorial Bridge. The art critic who proposed the idea called for a smaller arch or for Trump to pick a new...

item.title: Most of the federal government shuts down, but a quick end is in sight

item.title: Democrats want to ‘reimagine’ immigration enforcement. Just don’t say ‘abolish ICE.’
item.description: Democrats, quiet on immigration for most of the last year, are suddenly campaigning on it. But there is worry about overreach.

item.title: Senate passes funding deal, but short-term shutdown still expected
item.description: A temporary funding lapse will start Saturday, as Speaker Mike Johnson says the House can consider the agreement early next week.

item.title: Why Wall Street is unhappy with Trump's pick for Fed chair

item.title: Trump in Iowa tries to shift the conversation back to the economy
item.description: A brief swing through the farm state underscored administration fears about the midterms.

item.title: Americans give Trump low marks on handling of economy as midterms likely to center on affordability
item.description: Sixty-one percent of voters told a CNN poll released Friday that they disapprove of the way Trump is handling the economy.

item.title: Capitol agenda: Trump tests GOP with Fed probe
Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
